description: MySQL ek popular open-source relational database management system hai jo structured data store, retrieve aur manage karne ke liye use hota hai. Ye web applications, data analysis aur enterprise systems me widely use hota hai.

levels.description: Database basics aur MySQL ki basic concepts

topics.title: What is Database?
topics.english: A database is an organized collection of structured data stored electronically.
topics.hinglish: Database ek organized collection hai structured data ka jo electronically store hota hai.

practice.question: Database kya hota hai?
practice.answer: Organized collection of structured data jo electronically store hota hai

practice.question: Real-life me database ke 3 examples dijiye
practice.answer: School student records, hospital patient database, bank account information

practice.question: Database ka main purpose kya hai?
practice.answer: Data ko systematically store, organize, retrieve aur manage karna

practice.question: Database digital hone ke kya advantages hain?
practice.answer: Fast retrieval, easy updates, data security, backup facility, multiple users access

topics.title: SQL vs NoSQL
topics.english: Understanding the difference between SQL (relational) and NoSQL (non-relational) databases.
topics.hinglish: SQL (relational) aur NoSQL (non-relational) databases ke beech ka difference samajhna.
examples: CREATE TABLE users (id INT, name VARCHAR(100));

practice.question: SQL database ki main characteristics kya hain?
practice.answer: Structured data, tables with rows/columns, ACID compliance, fixed schema

practice.question: NoSQL database ki main characteristics kya hain?
practice.answer: Unstructured/semi-structured data, flexible schema, horizontal scaling, various data models

practice.question: Kab SQL database use karna chahiye?
practice.answer: Jab data structured ho, relationships important hon, ACID transactions required hon

practice.question: Kab NoSQL database use karna chahiye?
practice.answer: Jab data unstructured ho, massive scalability chahiye ho, flexible schema chahiye ho

topics.title: MySQL Introduction & History
topics.english: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system developed by MySQL AB (now owned by Oracle).
topics.hinglish: MySQL ek open-source relational database management system hai jo MySQL AB ne develop kiya (ab Oracle ke paas hai).

practice.question: MySQL kis company ne develop kiya?
practice.answer: MySQL AB (Swedish company), ab Oracle ke paas hai

practice.question: MySQL open-source hai ya proprietary?
practice.answer: Open-source (GPL license), enterprise version bhi available hai

practice.question: MySQL ka latest stable version kaun sa hai?
practice.answer: MySQL 8.0 (as of 2024)

practice.question: MySQL ke alternatives kya hain?
practice.answer: PostgreSQL, MariaDB, Oracle Database, Microsoft SQL Server, SQLite

topics.title: MySQL Installation - Windows
topics.english: Step-by-step guide to install MySQL on Windows operating system.
topics.hinglish: Windows operating system par MySQL install karne ka step-by-step guide.

practice.question: MySQL Windows pe install karne ka official source kya hai?
practice.answer: mysql.com website se MySQL Installer download karna

practice.question: Installation type 'Developer Default' kya hota hai?
practice.answer: Development ke liye required sab components automatically install hote hain

practice.question: Root password configure karte waqt kya dhyan rakhna chahiye?
practice.answer: Strong password use karna, password ko safely store karna

practice.question: MySQL Service Windows pe kaise check karte hain?
practice.answer: Services.msc open karke 'MySQL80' service check karna

topics.title: MySQL Installation - Mac/Linux
topics.english: Installing MySQL on macOS and Linux systems using package managers.
topics.hinglish: macOS aur Linux systems par package managers use karke MySQL install karna.

practice.question: Ubuntu pe MySQL install karne ka command kya hai?
practice.answer: sudo apt install mysql-server

practice.question: Mac pe Homebrew se MySQL install karne ka command?
practice.answer: brew install mysql

practice.question: Installation ke baad MySQL service kaise start karte hain?
practice.answer: Ubuntu: sudo systemctl start mysql, Mac: brew services start mysql

practice.question: Installation verify kaise karte hain?
practice.answer: mysql --version command run karke

topics.title: MySQL Workbench Introduction
topics.english: MySQL Workbench is the official GUI tool for MySQL database management.
topics.hinglish: MySQL Workbench official GUI tool hai MySQL database manage karne ke liye.

practice.question: MySQL Workbench kya hai?
practice.answer: Official GUI tool MySQL databases ke liye, visual interface provide karta hai

practice.question: MySQL Workbench ke main features kya hain?
practice.answer: SQL Editor, Database Design, Administration, Migration, Backup

practice.question: MySQL Workbench me new connection kaise create karte hain?
practice.answer: + icon click karke, connection details fill karke, Test Connection click karke

practice.question: Command Line vs Workbench me kya difference hai?
practice.answer: Command Line: text-based, powerful; Workbench: GUI-based, user-friendly

topics.title: Basic MySQL Commands
topics.english: Essential MySQL commands to get started with database operations.
topics.hinglish: Database operations start karne ke liye essential MySQL commands.

practice.question: MySQL me login kaise karte hain?
practice.answer: mysql -u username -p command use karke

practice.question: Available databases kaise dekhte hain?
practice.answer: SHOW DATABASES; command se

practice.question: Specific database select kaise karte hain?
practice.answer: USE database_name; command se

practice.question: MySQL se exit kaise karte hain?
practice.answer: EXIT; ya \q command se

levels.description: Basic SQL operations, data types, and simple queries

topics.title: Creating Databases
topics.english: Creating new databases using CREATE DATABASE statement.
topics.hinglish: CREATE DATABASE statement use karke naye databases create karna.
examples: CREATE DATABASE company CHARACTER SET utf8mb4;
CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS ecommerce;

practice.question: New database create karne ka SQL statement kya hai?
practice.answer: CREATE DATABASE database_name;

practice.question: Database already exists to error avoid kaise kare?
practice.answer: CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS database_name; use kare

practice.question: Specific character set ke sath database kaise create kare?
practice.answer: CREATE DATABASE db_name CHARACTER SET utf8mb4;

practice.question: Database delete karne ka command kya hai?
practice.answer: DROP DATABASE database_name;

topics.title: Data Types - Numeric
topics.english: Numeric data types in MySQL for storing numbers.
topics.hinglish: Numbers store karne ke liye MySQL me numeric data types.

practice.question: Age store karne ke liye konsa data type best hai?
practice.answer: TINYINT UNSIGNED (0-255 range)

practice.question: Price (999.99) store karne ke liye konsa data type use kare?
practice.answer: DECIMAL(10,2) exact decimal ke liye

practice.question: INT aur BIGINT me kya difference hai?
practice.answer: INT 4 bytes (2.14B), BIGINT 8 bytes (bahut bada range)

practice.question: FLOAT aur DECIMAL me kya difference hai?
practice.answer: FLOAT approximate, DECIMAL exact (financial data ke liye)

topics.title: Data Types - String & Text
topics.english: String and text data types for storing character data.
topics.hinglish: Character data store karne ke liye string aur text data types.

practice.question: CHAR aur VARCHAR me kya difference hai?
practice.answer: CHAR fixed length, VARCHAR variable length (storage efficient)

practice.question: Email address store karne ke liye konsa data type best hai?
practice.answer: VARCHAR(255) - variable length, reasonable max limit

practice.question: Long articles store karne ke liye konsa data type use kare?
practice.answer: TEXT ya LONGTEXT content length ke according

practice.question: ENUM data type kab use karna chahiye?
practice.answer: Jab fixed set of values ho (e.g., status: 'active', 'inactive')

topics.title: Data Types - Date & Time
topics.english: Date and time data types for storing temporal data.
topics.hinglish: Temporal data store karne ke liye date aur time data types.
examples: updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

practice.question: DATETIME aur TIMESTAMP me kya difference hai?
practice.answer: DATETIME manual set, TIMESTAMP auto-converts to UTC, range different

practice.question: Birthdate store karne ke liye konsa data type best hai?
practice.answer: DATE (only date chahiye, time nahi)

practice.question: Auto-updating timestamp kaise create kare?
practice.answer: TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

practice.question: Time zone support konsa data type deta hai?
practice.answer: TIMESTAMP automatically UTC me convert hota hai

topics.title: Creating Tables
topics.english: Creating tables with columns, data types, and constraints.
topics.hinglish: Columns, data types, aur constraints ke sath tables create karna.

practice.question: Table create karne ka basic syntax kya hai?
practice.answer: CREATE TABLE table_name (column1 datatype, column2 datatype, ...);

practice.question: Auto-increment primary key kaise define kare?
practice.answer: column_name INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY

practice.question: Column me NOT NULL constraint ka kya kaam hai?
practice.answer: NULL values allow nahi karta, mandatory field banata hai

practice.question: Table structure kaise check karte hain?
practice.answer: DESCRIBE table_name; ya SHOW CREATE TABLE table_name;

topics.title: ALTER TABLE Operations
topics.english: Modifying existing table structure using ALTER TABLE.
topics.hinglish: ALTER TABLE use karke existing table structure modify karna.
examples: ALTER TABLE students ADD COLUMN phone VARCHAR(15);
ALTER TABLE students MODIFY COLUMN name VARCHAR(150);
ALTER TABLE students CHANGE COLUMN phone mobile VARCHAR(15);
ALTER TABLE students DROP COLUMN mobile;
ALTER TABLE students ADD CONSTRAINT unique_email UNIQUE (email);
ALTER TABLE students RENAME TO learners;

practice.question: Existing table me new column add kaise kare?
practice.answer: ALTER TABLE table_name ADD COLUMN column_name datatype;

practice.question: Column ka data type change kaise kare?
practice.answer: ALTER TABLE table_name MODIFY COLUMN column_name new_datatype;

practice.question: Column ka name change kaise kare?
practice.answer: ALTER TABLE table_name CHANGE COLUMN old_name new_name datatype;

practice.question: Column delete kaise kare?
practice.answer: ALTER TABLE table_name DROP COLUMN column_name;

topics.title: DROP & TRUNCATE
topics.english: Removing databases, tables, and data using DROP and TRUNCATE.
topics.hinglish: DROP aur TRUNCATE use karke databases, tables, aur data remove karna.
examples: # Drop table (delete table structure and data)
# Truncate table (delete only data, keep structure)

practice.question: DROP TABLE aur TRUNCATE TABLE me kya difference hai?
practice.answer: DROP: structure aur data dono delete; TRUNCATE: sirf data delete, structure rahe

practice.question: Table delete karte waqt error avoid kaise kare?
practice.answer: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS table_name; use kare

practice.question: TRUNCATE ka advantage DELETE se kya hai?
practice.answer: TRUNCATE faster hai, auto-increment reset karta hai

practice.question: Database aur uska sab data delete kaise kare?
practice.answer: DROP DATABASE database_name;

topics.title: INSERT Data
topics.english: Inserting data into tables using INSERT statement.
topics.hinglish: INSERT statement use karke tables me data insert karna.
examples: INSERT INTO students (id, name, age) VALUES (1, 'Rahul', 20);
INSERT INTO students (id, name, age, email) VALUES (5, 'John', 30, NULL);
INSERT INTO student_archive SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 25;

practice.question: Single row insert karne ka syntax kya hai?
practice.answer: INSERT INTO table (col1, col2) VALUES (val1, val2);

practice.question: Multiple rows ek sath insert kaise kare?
practice.answer: INSERT INTO table VALUES (val1), (val2), (val3);

practice.question: Auto-increment column me insert karte waqt kya karna chahiye?
practice.answer: Column name list se omit karna ya NULL specify karna

practice.question: Another table se data copy kaise kare?
practice.answer: INSERT INTO table1 SELECT * FROM table2 WHERE condition;

topics.title: SELECT Queries
topics.english: Retrieving data from tables using SELECT statement.
topics.hinglish: SELECT statement use karke tables se data retrieve karna.
examples: SELECT name AS student_name, age AS student_age FROM students;
SELECT name, age, YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - age AS birth_year FROM students;

practice.question: Table ke sab columns kaise select kare?
practice.answer: SELECT * FROM table_name;

practice.question: Specific columns kaise select kare?
practice.answer: SELECT column1, column2 FROM table_name;

practice.question: Column ka alias name kaise de?
practice.answer: SELECT column_name AS alias_name FROM table;

practice.question: Duplicate values hatane ke liye kya use kare?
practice.answer: SELECT DISTINCT column_name FROM table;

topics.title: WHERE Clause
topics.english: Filtering rows based on conditions using WHERE clause.
topics.hinglish: WHERE clause use karke conditions ke basis par rows filter karna.
examples: SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20 AND city = 'Mumbai';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age IN (20, 21, 22);
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 25;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE email IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE email IS NOT NULL;

practice.question: WHERE clause ka purpose kya hai?
practice.answer: Specific conditions ke according rows filter karna

practice.question: Multiple conditions kaise combine kare?
practice.answer: AND (both true), OR (either true), NOT (reverse condition)

practice.question: Pattern matching ke liye konsa operator use kare?
practice.answer: LIKE operator with % (any characters) and _ (single character)

practice.question: NULL values check kaise kare?
practice.answer: IS NULL ya IS NOT NULL use kare (= NULL work nahi karta)

topics.title: UPDATE Data
topics.english: Modifying existing data in tables using UPDATE statement.
topics.hinglish: UPDATE statement use karke tables me existing data modify karna.
examples: UPDATE students SET age = 21 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE students SET age = 22, city = 'Delhi' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE products SET price = price * 0.9 WHERE category = 'Electronics';
UPDATE orders SET status = 'completed' WHERE order_id IN (
SELECT order_id FROM payments WHERE status = 'paid'

practice.question: Data update karne ka basic syntax kya hai?
practice.answer: UPDATE table_name SET column = value WHERE condition;

practice.question: WHERE clause na use kare to kya hoga?
practice.answer: Sab rows update ho jayengi - dangerous!

practice.question: Multiple columns ek sath update kaise kare?
practice.answer: UPDATE table SET col1=val1, col2=val2 WHERE condition;

practice.question: Calculation ke sath update kaise kare?
practice.answer: UPDATE table SET price = price * 1.1; (10% increase)

topics.title: DELETE Data
topics.english: Removing rows from tables using DELETE statement.
topics.hinglish: DELETE statement use karke tables se rows remove karna.
examples: DELETE FROM logs ORDER BY created_at LIMIT 1000;
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id NOT IN (

practice.question: Specific rows delete karne ka syntax kya hai?
practice.answer: DELETE FROM table_name WHERE condition;

practice.question: DELETE aur TRUNCATE me kya difference hai?
practice.answer: DELETE: row-by-row delete, can be rolled back; TRUNCATE: faster, resets auto-increment

practice.question: WHERE clause na use kare to kya hoga?
practice.answer: Table ke sab rows delete ho jayenge - very dangerous!

practice.question: LIMIT ke sath delete kaise kare?
practice.answer: DELETE FROM table ORDER BY column LIMIT number;

levels.description: Advanced queries, joins, functions, and constraints

topics.title: ORDER BY
topics.english: Sorting query results in ascending or descending order.
topics.hinglish: Query results ko ascending ya descending order me sort karna.
examples: SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY age;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY city ASC, age DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM students ORDER BY 2 DESC; -- Sort by age
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price IS NULL, price;

practice.question: Results ascending order me sort kaise kare?
practice.answer: ORDER BY column_name ASC (ASC optional, default hai)

practice.question: Results descending order me sort kaise kare?
practice.answer: ORDER BY column_name DESC

practice.question: Multiple columns ke basis par sort kaise kare?
practice.answer: ORDER BY col1 ASC, col2 DESC; (pehle col1, phir col2)

practice.question: NULL values sort order me kahan aate hain?
practice.answer: ASC me last me, DESC me first me (MySQL me)

topics.title: LIMIT & OFFSET
topics.english: Limiting number of rows returned and implementing pagination.
topics.hinglish: Returned rows ki number limit karna aur pagination implement karna.
examples: SELECT * FROM students LIMIT 10 OFFSET 20; -- Rows 21-30
SELECT * FROM students LIMIT 20, 10; -- Same as above
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 5;

practice.question: First 10 rows kaise select kare?
practice.answer: SELECT * FROM table LIMIT 10;

practice.question: Pagination ke liye LIMIT aur OFFSET kaise use kare?
practice.answer: SELECT * FROM table LIMIT page_size OFFSET (page-1)*page_size;

practice.question: Most expensive 5 products kaise select kare?
practice.answer: SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;

practice.question: Random 3 records kaise select kare?
practice.answer: SELECT * FROM table ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 3;

topics.title: Aggregate Functions
topics.english: Performing calculations on multiple rows using aggregate functions.
topics.hinglish: Aggregate functions use karke multiple rows par calculations perform karna.
examples: SELECT COUNT(email) FROM students; -- Non-NULL emails
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(name) FROM students WHERE city = 'Mumbai';
SELECT COUNT(*), AVG(age), MAX(age), MIN(age) FROM students;

practice.question: Table me total rows count kaise kare?
practice.answer: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM table;

practice.question: Column ke values ka sum kaise calculate kare?
practice.answer: SELECT SUM(column_name) FROM table;

practice.question: Average value kaise calculate kare?
practice.answer: SELECT AVG(column_name) FROM table;

practice.question: COUNT(*) aur COUNT(column) me kya difference hai?
practice.answer: COUNT(*) sab rows count karta hai, COUNT(column) sirf non-NULL values

topics.title: GROUP BY
topics.english: Grouping rows that have same values for aggregate calculations.
topics.hinglish: Same values wale rows ko group karna aggregate calculations ke liye.
examples: SELECT city, COUNT(*) FROM students GROUP BY city;
SELECT city, gender, COUNT(*) FROM students GROUP BY city, gender;
SELECT department, AVG(salary), MAX(salary), MIN(salary) FROM employees GROUP BY department;
SELECT city, COUNT(*) FROM students WHERE age > 20 GROUP BY city;
SELECT YEAR(created_at), COUNT(*) FROM orders GROUP BY YEAR(created_at);
SELECT city, COUNT(*) FROM students GROUP BY city HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;

practice.question: GROUP BY ka purpose kya hai?
practice.answer: Same values wale rows ko group karna aggregate functions ke liye

practice.question: SELECT list me GROUP BY ke saath kya include kar sakte hain?
practice.answer: Grouped columns aur aggregate functions

practice.question: Multiple columns ke basis par group kaise kare?
practice.answer: GROUP BY column1, column2, column3;

practice.question: WHERE aur HAVING me kya difference hai?
practice.answer: WHERE rows filter karta hai grouping se pehle, HAVING groups filter karta hai

topics.title: HAVING Clause
topics.english: Filtering groups after GROUP BY using HAVING clause.
topics.hinglish: GROUP BY ke baad groups ko filter karna HAVING clause use karke.
examples: SELECT city, COUNT(*) FROM students GROUP BY city HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT department, AVG(salary) FROM employees GROUP BY department HAVING AVG(salary) > 50000;
SELECT category, COUNT(*), AVG(price) FROM products GROUP BY category HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 AND AVG(price) < 1000;
SELECT city, COUNT(*) FROM students WHERE age > 18 GROUP BY city HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*), SUM(amount) FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 AND SUM(amount) > 1000;

practice.question: HAVING clause ka use kab karte hain?
practice.answer: GROUP BY ke baad groups ko filter karne ke liye

practice.question: HAVING me aggregate functions use kar sakte hain?
practice.answer: Haan, jaise HAVING AVG(salary) > 50000

practice.question: WHERE aur HAVING ek sath use kar sakte hain?
practice.answer: Haan, pehle WHERE rows filter karega, phir GROUP BY, phir HAVING groups filter karega

practice.question: City with more than 100 students kaise find kare?
practice.answer: SELECT city, COUNT(*) FROM students GROUP BY city HAVING COUNT(*) > 100;

topics.title: String Functions
topics.english: Manipulating string data using built-in string functions.
topics.hinglish: Built-in string functions use karke string data manipulate karna.
examples: SELECT CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name FROM employees;
SELECT CONCAT_WS(' ', first_name, last_name) FROM employees;
SELECT TRIM('  Hello  '), LTRIM('  Hello'), RTRIM('Hello  ');
SELECT SUBSTRING(email, 1, 5), LEFT(email, 10), RIGHT(email, 3) FROM users;
SELECT LOCATE('@', email), POSITION('@' IN email) FROM users;

practice.question: Two strings concatenate kaise kare?
practice.answer: CONCAT(str1, str2) ya str1 || str2 (MySQL 8.0+)

practice.question: String ka case kaise change kare?
practice.answer: UPPER() uppercase me, LOWER() lowercase me

practice.question: String ke starting/ending spaces kaise remove kare?
practice.answer: TRIM() dono sides se, LTRIM() left se, RTRIM() right se

practice.question: String ki length kaise find kare?
practice.answer: LENGTH() bytes me, CHAR_LENGTH() characters me

topics.title: Numeric Functions
topics.english: Performing mathematical operations using numeric functions.
topics.hinglish: Numeric functions use karke mathematical operations perform karna.
examples: SELECT price, price * 1.1 AS price_with_tax FROM products;
SELECT ROUND(price, 2), CEIL(price), FLOOR(price) FROM products;

practice.question: Number round kaise kare?
practice.answer: ROUND(number, decimals) - ROUND(123.456, 2) = 123.46

practice.question: Ceil aur Floor me kya difference hai?
practice.answer: CEIL upar wala integer, FLOOR neeche wala integer

practice.question: Random number between 1 and 100 kaise generate kare?
practice.answer: FLOOR(RAND() * 100) + 1

practice.question: Modulo (remainder) kaise calculate kare?
practice.answer: MOD(dividend, divisor) ya dividend % divisor

topics.title: Date & Time Functions
topics.english: Working with date and time values using date functions.
topics.hinglish: Date functions use karke date aur time values ke saath kaam karna.
examples: SELECT YEAR(order_date), MONTH(order_date), DAY(order_date) FROM orders;
SELECT HOUR(created_at), MINUTE(created_at), SECOND(created_at) FROM logs;

practice.question: Current date aur time kaise get kare?
practice.answer: NOW() date aur time, CURDATE() sirf date, CURTIME() sirf time

practice.question: Date me se year, month, day kaise extract kare?
practice.answer: YEAR(date), MONTH(date), DAY(date)

practice.question: 7 days add kaise kare current date me?
practice.answer: DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)

practice.question: Date ko different format me kaise display kare?
practice.answer: DATE_FORMAT(date, '%d/%m/%Y')

topics.title: NULL Functions
topics.english: Handling NULL values using functions like COALESCE, IFNULL, NULLIF.
topics.hinglish: COALESCE, IFNULL, NULLIF jaise functions use karke NULL values handle karna.
examples: SELECT COALESCE(email, phone, 'No contact') FROM users;
SELECT NULLIF(salary, 0) FROM employees; -- Returns NULL if salary=0
SELECT CASE WHEN email IS NULL THEN 'No email' ELSE email END FROM users;
SELECT 10 + NULL, 10 * NULL, CONCAT('Hello', NULL); -- All return NULL

practice.question: COALESCE function kya karta hai?
practice.answer: First non-NULL value return karta hai list me se

practice.question: IFNULL aur COALESCE me kya difference hai?
practice.answer: IFNULL sirf 2 parameters leta hai, COALESCE multiple parameters le sakta hai

practice.question: NULLIF function kya karta hai?
practice.answer: Don't parameters equal hain to NULL return karta hai

practice.question: NULL value ko default value se replace kaise kare?
practice.answer: COALESCE(column, default_value) ya IFNULL(column, default_value)

topics.title: CASE Statement
topics.english: Conditional logic in SQL queries using CASE statement.
topics.hinglish: CASE statement use karke SQL queries me conditional logic implement karna.
examples: COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'active' THEN 1 END) AS active_count,
COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'inactive' THEN 1 END) AS inactive_count

practice.question: CASE statement ka syntax kya hai?
practice.answer: CASE WHEN condition1 THEN result1 WHEN condition2 THEN result2 ELSE default END

practice.question: CASE statement SELECT me kaise use kare?
practice.answer: SELECT CASE WHEN age>18 THEN 'Adult' ELSE 'Minor' END FROM students;

practice.question: CASE statement UPDATE me kaise use kare?
practice.answer: UPDATE table SET column=CASE WHEN cond THEN val1 ELSE val2 END;

practice.question: Conditional count kaise calculate kare?
practice.answer: COUNT(CASE WHEN condition THEN 1 END)

topics.title: Joins - INNER JOIN
topics.english: Combining rows from two or more tables based on related columns.
topics.hinglish: Related columns ke basis par do ya zyada tables ki rows combine karna.
examples: INNER JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
INNER JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id;
INNER JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
INNER JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
INNER JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
SELECT e1.name AS employee, e2.name AS manager
INNER JOIN employees e2 ON e1.manager_id = e2.employee_id;

practice.question: INNER JOIN kya return karta hai?
practice.answer: Sirf matching rows dono tables se

practice.question: INNER JOIN ka basic syntax kya hai?
practice.answer: SELECT columns FROM table1 INNER JOIN table2 ON table1.column = table2.column

practice.question: Table aliases ka use kyu karte hain?
practice.answer: Code readable banane ke liye aur ambiguous columns avoid karne ke liye

practice.question: Three tables kaise join kare?
practice.answer: table1 JOIN table2 ON condition JOIN table3 ON condition

topics.title: Joins - LEFT JOIN
topics.english: Returning all rows from left table and matching rows from right table.
topics.hinglish: Left table ki sab rows aur right table ki matching rows return karna.
examples: LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id
WHERE orders.order_id IS NULL; -- Customers with no orders
LEFT JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id
LEFT JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
LEFT JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id

practice.question: LEFT JOIN kya return karta hai?
practice.answer: Left table ki sab rows aur right table ki matching rows (missing = NULL)

practice.question: Customers with no orders kaise find kare?
practice.answer: LEFT JOIN orders WHERE orders.order_id IS NULL

practice.question: LEFT JOIN me NULL values kaise handle kare?
practice.answer: COALESCE ya IFNULL use kare

practice.question: LEFT JOIN vs INNER JOIN me kya difference hai?
practice.answer: LEFT JOIN: all left rows; INNER JOIN: only matching rows

topics.title: Joins - RIGHT JOIN & FULL JOIN
topics.english: RIGHT JOIN returns all rows from right table. FULL JOIN returns all rows when there's a match in either table.
topics.hinglish: RIGHT JOIN right table ki sab rows return karta hai. FULL JOIN dono tables ki sab rows return karta hai.
examples: RIGHT JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
# RIGHT JOIN equivalent to LEFT JOIN
SELECT * FROM table1 RIGHT JOIN table2 ON condition;
